text: We will hear arguments next in Community Communications Company against City of Boulder.
Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court, Plaintiff in this case is a cable television operator.

Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court, I appear on behalf of the 23 amici states, including Colorado, who believe that home rule cities should not have state action antitrust immunity in the circumstances which exist in this case.
Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court, I think it is appropriate to begin by analyzing what the city of Boulder did here.
Your time has expired now, Mr. Farrow.
